mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nvrealtimeaccept ( seq, ecare_no, channel, svc_id, req_user_id, req_dt, req_tm, tmpl_type, receiver_id, receiver_nm , receiver, sender_nm, sender, subject, send_fg, slot1, slot2, secu_key, security_path, reserved_date , preview_type, data_cnt, file_path1, file_path2, file_path3, srfidd, jonmun ) SELECT #{newSeq}, ecare_no, channel, svc_id, req_user_id, convert(varchar(8),getdate(),112), convert(varchar(6),getdate(),108), tmpl_type, receiver_id, receiver_nm , receiver , #{receiver} , sender_nm, sender, subject, 'R', slot1, slot2, secu_key, security_path, reserved_date , 'N' preview_type, data_cnt, file_path1, file_path2, file_path3, #{srfidd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jonmun FROM nvrealtimeaccept WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM nvrealtimeaccept WHERE seq = #{seq} AND send_fg = 'R' AND result_seq IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT '{"STATE_FG":"' + a.send_fg + '", "SEND_CD":"' + coalesce(b.error_cd, 'NONE') + '", "SEND_MSG":"' + (CASE WHEN b.error_cd = '250' THEN 'Success' ELSE coalesce(b.err_msg, 'NONE') END) +'"}' FROM ( SELECT ecare_no, result_seq, list_seq, seq, send_fg FROM nvrealtimeaccept WHERE seq = #{seq} ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN nvecaresendlog b ON a.seq = b.seq AND a.ecare_no = b.ecare_no AND a.result_seq = b.result_seq AND a.list_seq = b.list_seq
